column5: So there is a show on Bravo called Star Portraits and my sister in law, Morag Webster, applied and was one of the three accepted artists to do Theo Fleury's portrait.  Pretty Cool.  Then she won     Our family is pretty proud right now  Here is the link if anyone is interested.  Just had to share  http://starportraits.ca/the-show/theo-fleury  Joey
Thats  awesome J.  Hope you dont mind.
That's awesome Joey. Congrats to Morag!!:clapping:
Don't mind at all Brian, I think she did an excellent job  Thanks guys!!
Thats cool! Jood job on her!
Very cool !!! Congrats.She really nailed it perfectly
Your sister in law has amazing skills Joey    Congrats to her Thanks for sharing Leechman
